title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: Stella Concora Age 8.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Half drop repeat of park scene with house, park benches, children's slide, people, and flowers. Printed in three colors: gold, blue, and salmon (gold over blue for green, salmon over blue for purple, gold over salmon for orange, and all three colors for brown).
